attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Great Britain Does not want Nuclear Energy running this Country We as a nation want and deserve a more safer source of energy ie greener and secure the enviroment for future generations.we have to use wind turbines and solar energy and water turbines. Nuclear sources have proved dangerous immoral and too expensive too even consider DO NOT USE IT.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
